paragraphs.body: I wouldn't call it for nothing.  As time goes on, the article can be expanded, but its still important to keep the writing of the information we already have up-to-standard.  --AvatarRokus Ghost (Message me • Read my fanon)   23:28, March 23, 2012 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Personally I think ${link_0} is long enough now.  Also, we know a lot of the backstory that will remain constant.  Plus, some of the subdivisions of the article have their own main pages, so that minimizes the parts that will need changing later on.  --AvatarRokus Ghost (Message me • Read my fanon)   06:21, March 25, 2012 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Me and Dcasawang1 were discussing on how many members the group should have and who would be able to join. I think that the group should only have a "higher" contributers and rollback/admin members. Discuss.

paragraphs.body: Several days ago, when the new requests page was set up, several new requests were made, and it came up in a conversation between DC and myself that we should have a maximum number of members that can join the group. 12 users seems like a good limit to me; what do you guys think about this? Annawantimes (Talk) 21:05, July 9, 2012 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I feel like it's been approximately a year since there's been some real activity in this group, so I'm going to try and spark something up here. I suppose there's no real necessary point in this, but I'd at least like to do a head count and see who's still remaining in the group, and what we can do to make sure all of our members stay on task. Especially now that it's summer I think most of our members who actually are dedicated to this group should be able to edit, and perhaps we can come up with an organized system to help pick out new articles? (I've noticed it's been a month since our last one ended…) I suggest perhaps having like a rotation so a different person is in charge of picking out an article each 2 week break? Fire  Ferret 01:18, June 29, 2013 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I see you gave everyone a week. I'd say that we then start with Korra's article in a week as to start our project of getting those pages up to standard before the new series -and that will make the move to their own history page once the new book starts easier, cause then we can just copy/past a high-standard article, which is always nice. Lady Lostris vstf (talk • HotN) 12:50, July 5, 2013 (UTC)
